comment: The content is boring (at least to my interests) and there are a lot of art pieces you will have to memorize which makes the tests fairly difficult but there is a TON of extra credit.
Easy online art course. I had a score of 105.7% when finished. Assignments due every Sunday that are quite easy. Worth taking!
If you want an easy A def take her! No lockdown browser and only one discussion post a week
ART1107: She was quite communicative of any questions asked. Her tests were a little difficult, but her art projects were fun. It was an easy A.

(ART 1107) You are only required to do 4 discussion post but can do more for extra points. She offers a lot of extra credit. There are 3 exams which can be difficult if you didn't take the time to study the material in the book. I recommend that you save the powerpoints each week since the module closes at the end of the week.

Great professor, you only have 3 tests and I was an online course so everything was discussion posts each week and we wrote one essay about an artwork we liked, so be prepared to go to a museum. This class is eay honeslty you don't do much work so just keep up
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor W is very passionate about art. Her tone in her emails are very condescending though. Just do the work on time and you will be fine.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Lecture heavy

comment: I love Professor Wachtman and the course is a really fun class. You will learn a lot about art. I had a lot of fun completing the art projects for this course. Only negative is there is a lot of assignments for a 2 credit hour class. She does give you 2 weeks to do assignments. There are 2 video assignments and you will need the textbook.
The class seems like a lot of busy work. Professor W is really nice though and you do learn how to integrate art into your future classroom. Overall, its an easy A just complete the work.

The class was helpful in learning how to integrate art into elementary curriculum. I felt that some of the group projects were kind of pointless but they were not difficult. Also, she wrote the textbook so, of course it was mandatory but it was not that useful. The assignments to be done from the book were just busy work. Overall an okay class.

For a two credit hour class, there is too much work. But it's an easy grade. She grades based on effort, not talent. There is a lot of group work involved and projects are due every other Sunday. There's usually a reading assignment, project, and art project due each time. I definitely recommend taking this online. There is one required textbook.
